dialogue.htmlContent:
The crude wooden gates of the makeshift fortress are wide open, and as you draw near, you find yourself wondering if their shoddy construction would even allow them to be closed. The two alpha-imps on guard duty notice your approach, and gaze lustfully at your body as the leader calls out, [npc.speech(Ya can come an' go as yer please, but I can tell yer hungry for imp #IFnpc.hasPenis()#THENcock#ELSEpussy#ENDIF, so why don'cha get down on yer knees and put that mouth o' yours to use?)]

Ignoring the imps' taunts, you hold your head up high as they reluctantly step aside to let you pass. Your way now unobstructed, you move to continue onwards, trying your best to filter out the imps' lewd taunts as you move past them...

J-Just don' cause any trouble... Please...)]

The crude wooden gates of the makeshift fortress are wide open, and as you draw near, you find yourself wondering if their shoddy construction would even allow them to be closed. The pair of alpha-imp guards who once stood here have long since run away, leaving the entrance to the fortress completely undefended.
[style.italicsBad(If you choose to leave the fortress now, you can be sure that there will be new guards at the gate when you return!)]

The crude wooden gates of the makeshift fortress are wide open, and as you draw near, you find yourself wondering if their shoddy construction would even allow them to be closed. The two alpha-imps on guard duty notice your approach, and shuffle around nervously as the leader calls out, [npc.speech('Ey! You! S-Stop right there! Y-You ain't comin' close to our base and gettin' away with it!)]

Although you can tell that these imps are ready for a fight, they seem quite scared of you. To confirm what you suspected, the second imp turns to [npc2.her] leader and hisses, [npc2.speech(H-Hol' on! [pc.SheIs] [pc.a_race]! W-We can't be fighin' a demon! [pc.She]'ll beat us easy!)]

[npc.speech(An' we'll get beaten' fer sure if tha boss finds out we didn't do as we're told, ya idiot!)] the leader snaps back, before turning towards you again. [npc.speech(S-So ya gonna surrender nice an' easy, right?! D-Don't want us beatin' you down, do ya?!)]

The imps are quite clearly terrified of standing against a demon, and you imagine that it wouldn't take much to intimidate them into surrendering to you. Then again, you could always just give them the fight they expect...

Y-You ain't comin' close to our base and gettin' away with it!)]

You ain't comin' close to our base and gettin' away with it!)]

Having concluded the business you had here, you find yourself stepping out of the fortress's open gateway. Without a backwards glance, you head down the slight incline before you, ready to continue onwards into Submission's tunnels once again.

Wanting to resolve this situation without resorting to violence, you hold up your [pc.hands] to show that you mean no harm, before smirking at the imps and asking, [pc.speech(Is there no way I can get in to speak to your boss? Surely there's something I could do to get on your good side...)]

The imps lower their weapons, and, [npc.her] snarl turning into a wicked grin, the leader responds, [npc.speech(What yer willin' ta do ta get in 'ere? Eh?)]

Licking your [pc.lips+], you step forwards and sink down onto your knees before the two guards. Winking at the leader, you put on your most seductive voice as you make your offer, [pc.speech(How about you let me use my mouth on the two of you?)]

[npc.speech(Hungry fer imp #IFnpc.hasPenis()#THENcock#ELSEpussy#ENDIF, huh, slut?)] the leader sneers, before stepping forwards and grabbing your chin. [npc.speech(In that case, please stand aside, [pc.master]. I'll be no more than thirty seconds.)]

As the two of you hold this conversation, you notice that the imp guards are getting more and more visibly terrified. As your elemental steps forwards, they let out a synchronised scream, and, stumbling over their own feet, they rush to stand aside. Dropping [npc2.her] weapon, the leader pleads, [npc2.speech(P-Please, spare us! W-We'd make terrible slaves, honest! Y-You can come an' go as yer please, j-just don't hurt us!)]

[pc.speech(Hmm, I suppose I am feeling merciful today,)] you state, before turning towards [npc.name]. [pc.speech(Come along, these ones aren't worth your time.)]

Ignoring the imps' cowardly words, you hold your head up high as they abandon the duty that was given to them. Your way now unobstructed, you move forwards through the gates, trying your best to filter out the imps' pathetic apologies as you stride past them...

Thinking that these imps look particularly cowardly, you think that simply summoning your elemental would be enough to intimidate them. Grinning down at the leader, you declare, [pc.speech(You really think you stand a chance against me?! Perhaps if you can defeat my elemental, you'll have earned the right to challenge me!)]

The colour instantly drains from [npc2.namePos] cheeks, and [npc2.she] hisses to [npc2.her] superior, [npc2.speech('Ey! A-An elemental?! Ain't that one o' those arcane thingies?! W-We can't fight that!)]

Dropping [npc2.her] weapon, the leader pleads, [npc2.speech(P-Please, spare us! W-We don't want no trouble with one o' those arcane thingies! J-Just, please don't hurt us!)]

[pc.speech(Hmm, I suppose I am feeling merciful today,)] you state, before turning towards [npc.name]. [pc.speech(Come along, these ones aren't worth your time.)]

[npc.speech(N-No! W-Wait, we were just doin' as we were told!)] the leader stutters, stumbling backwards and lowering [npc.her] weapon. [npc.speech(T-There's no need fer ya ta be doin' that...)]

[pc.speech(Move!)] you command, glaring down at the leader.

[npc.speech(S-Sorry!)] [npc.She] instantly cries, tripping over [npc.her] own feet as [npc.she] hurries to get out of your way. [npc.speech(Y-You can come an' go as yer please, of course! S-Sorry fer the trouble!)]

Ignoring the imps' cowardly words, you hold your head up high as they abandon the duty that was given to them. Your way now unobstructed, you move forwards through the gates, trying your best to filter out the imps' pathetic apologies as you stride past them...
Having enslaved the imp guards, there's nothing left for you to do except continue on your way into the fortress...

The two guards slump to the floor, their weapons falling from their hands to clatter harmlessly against the rocks underfoot. Looking up at you as [npc.she] gasps for breath, the leader pleads, [npc.speech(N-No more... Y-Ya got us...)]

Looking down at the defeated figures before you, you wonder if you should take advantage of them, or simply continue on into the fortress...

[style.italicsBad(If you choose to leave the guards behind, you can be sure that they'll have run off into Submission by the time you return!)]
